item.title: True Names, Part 08 — CONCLUSION
item.description: Here’s part eight (the conclusion) of the podcast reading of "True Names," the novella I co-wrote with Ben Rosenbaum. This week, it’s me reading! Link

item.title: True Names, Part 01
item.description: Here's the first installment of a podcast reading of a new novella that I co-wrote with Hugo- and Nebula-nominee Benjamin Rosenbaum. The story's a big, 32,000-word piece called "True Names" (in homage to Vernor Vinge's famous story of the same name), and it involves the galactic wars between vast, post-Singularity intelligences that are competing to corner the universe's supply of computation before the heat-death of the universe.
